description.zh-cn: 中国明朝后期女真建州左卫领袖，清朝实际创始人努尔哈赤的父亲。曾为建州右卫都指挥使王杲的部下，后归顺明朝，官至建州左卫指挥使。1636年被皇太极追尊为福王，1648年被顺治帝追谥为宣皇帝，庙号显祖。
description.en: A Jurchen leader of the Jianzhou Left Guard during the late Ming Dynasty in China, and the father of Nurhaci, the founder of the Qing Dynasty. He was once a subordinate of Wang Gao, the commander of the Jianzhou Right Guard, but later submitted to the Ming Dynasty and was promoted to Commander of the Jianzhou Left Guard. In 1636, he was posthumously honored as Prince Fu by Hong Taiji. In 1648, he was posthumously honored as Emperor Xuan with the temple name Xianzhu by the Shunzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的父亲，努尔哈赤的祖父。后被追尊为清景祖。
description.en: Taksi's father and Nurhaci's grandfather. He was posthumously honored as Qing Jingzu.

description.zh-cn: 觉昌安的妻子，塔克世的母亲。后被追赠为翼皇后。
description.en: Wife of Giocangga and mother of Taksi. She was posthumously honored as Empress Yi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝的奠基者，后金开国皇帝，后被追尊为清太祖。塔克世与宣皇后的长子。
description.en: The founder of the Qing dynasty, the founding emperor of the Later Jin dynasty, posthumously honored as Emperor Taizu of Qing. He was the eldest son of Taksi and Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年建州右卫都指挥使。
description.en: Commander of the Jianzhou Right Guard during the late Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期设立的女真卫所之一。
description.en: One of the Jurchen guard posts established during the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝后期将领。
description.en: A general in the late Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期设立的女真卫所之一。
description.en: One of the Jurchen guard posts established during the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的侄女婿，曾叛明。
description.en: Taksi's nephew-in-law, who rebelled against the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，在攻破古埒城后杀害了塔克世和觉昌安。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty general who killed Taksi and Giocangga after conquering Gure city.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第二位皇帝，努尔哈赤第八子。
description.en: The second emperor of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，清朝入关后的首位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的嫡夫人，喜塔腊氏。努尔哈赤、舒尔哈齐、雅尔哈齐、沾河姑的生母。后被追尊为宣皇后。
description.en: Taksi's primary consort, of the Hitara clan. She was the birth mother of Nurhaci, Šurhaci, Yarhaci, and Zhanhegu. She was posthumously honored as Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的次夫人，哈达那拉氏，巴雅喇的生母。
description.en: Taksi's secondary consort, of the Hada Nara clan, the birth mother of Bayara.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的庶妃，穆尔哈齐的生母。
description.en: Taksi's concubine, the birth mother of Murhaci.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的次子，封为诚毅勇壮贝勒。
description.en: The second son of Taksi, granted the title of Prince Chengyi Yongzhuang.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的第三子，努尔哈赤同母弟，封为和硕庄亲王。
description.en: The third son of Taksi and a full brother of Nurhaci, granted the title of Prince Zhuang of the First Rank.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的第四子，努尔哈赤同母弟，封为通达郡王。
description.en: The fourth son of Taksi and a full brother of Nurhaci, granted the title of Prince Tongda of the Second Rank.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世的第五子，封为笃义刚果贝勒。
description.en: The fifth son of Taksi, granted the title of Prince Duyi Gangguo.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世之女，努尔哈赤异母姐，乌拉部贝勒常柱之妻。
description.en: Daughter of Taksi, half-sister of Nurhaci, and wife of Cangju, a Beile of the Ula tribe.

description.zh-cn: 海西女真乌拉部贝勒。
description.en: A Beile of the Ula tribe of the Haixi Jurchens.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世之女，努尔哈赤同母妹，后追封为和硕静安公主。
description.en: Daughter of Taksi, full sister of Nurhaci, posthumously granted the title of Princess Jing'an of the First Rank.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世是觉昌安的第四子。
description.en: Taksi was the fourth son of Giocangga.

description.zh-cn: 翼皇后是塔克世的母亲。
description.en: Empress Yi was the mother of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖末年，塔克世作为建州右卫都指挥使王杲的部下。
description.en: In the late Jiajing era, Taksi was a subordinate of Wang Gao, the commander of the Jianzhou Right Guard.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世背弃王杲归顺明朝，并帮助李成梁击灭王杲。
description.en: Taksi betrayed Wang Gao, submitted to the Ming Dynasty, and helped Li Chengliang defeat Wang Gao.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世归顺明朝，后升任建州左卫指挥使。
description.en: Taksi submitted to the Ming Dynasty and was later promoted to Commander of the Jianzhou Left Guard.

description.zh-cn: 万历二年（1574年），塔克世帮助李成梁击灭王杲，升任建州左卫指挥使。
description.en: In 1574 (the second year of the Wanli era), Taksi helped Li Chengliang defeat Wang Gao and was promoted to Commander of the Jianzhou Left Guard.

description.zh-cn: 万历二年（1574年），在塔克世的帮助下，李成梁击灭了王杲。
description.en: In 1574, with the help of Taksi, Li Chengliang defeated Wang Gao.

description.zh-cn: 尼堪外兰在古埒城纵兵屠城，导致塔克世死难。
description.en: Nikan Wailan's troops massacred the inhabitants of Gure city, leading to the death of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 尼堪外兰在古埒城纵兵屠城，导致觉昌安死难。
description.en: Nikan Wailan's troops massacred the inhabitants of Gure city, leading to the death of Giocangga.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极追尊塔克世为福王。
description.en: Hong Taiji posthumously honored Taksi as Prince Fu.

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝追谥塔克世为宣皇帝，庙号显祖。
description.en: The Shunzhi Emperor posthumously honored Taksi as Emperor Xuan with the temple name Xianzhu.

description.zh-cn: 宣皇后是塔克世的嫡夫人。
description.en: Empress Xuan was Taksi's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 清显祖继妃是塔克世的次夫人。
description.en: The secondary consort of Qing Xianzhu was Taksi's secondary consort.

description.zh-cn: 李佳氏是塔克世的庶妃。
description.en: Lady Ligiya was Taksi's concubine.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤是塔克世的长子。
description.en: Nurhaci was the eldest son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤的生母为宣皇后。
description.en: Nurhaci's birth mother was Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 穆尔哈齐是塔克世的次子。
description.en: Murhaci was the second son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 穆尔哈齐的生母为李佳氏。
description.en: Murhaci's birth mother was Lady Ligiya.

description.zh-cn: 舒尔哈齐是塔克世的第三子。
description.en: Šurhaci was the third son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 舒尔哈齐是努尔哈赤的同母弟，其生母为宣皇后。
description.en: Šurhaci was a full brother of Nurhaci; his birth mother was Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 舒尔哈齐是努尔哈赤的同母弟。
description.en: Šurhaci was a full brother of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 雅尔哈齐是塔克世的第四子。
description.en: Yarhaci was the fourth son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 雅尔哈齐是努尔哈赤的同母弟，其生母为宣皇后。
description.en: Yarhaci was a full brother of Nurhaci; his birth mother was Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 雅尔哈齐是努尔哈赤的同母弟。
description.en: Yarhaci was a full brother of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 巴雅喇是塔克世的第五子。
description.en: Bayara was the fifth son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 巴雅喇的生母为恳哲（清显祖继妃）。
description.en: Bayara's birth mother was Kenzhe (Secondary consort of Qing Xianzhu).

description.zh-cn: 塔克世之女。
description.en: Daughter of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 常柱妻是努尔哈赤的异母姐。
description.en: The wife of Cangju was a half-sister of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 常柱是塔克世之女的丈夫。
description.en: Cangju was the husband of Taksi's daughter.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世之女。
description.en: Daughter of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 沾河姑是努尔哈赤的同母妹，其生母为宣皇后。
description.en: Zhanhegu was a full sister of Nurhaci; her birth mother was Empress Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 沾河姑是努尔哈赤的同母妹。
description.en: Zhanhegu was a full sister of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 阿台是塔克世的姪女婿。
description.en: Atai was Taksi's nephew-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 阿台曾叛明。
description.en: Atai rebelled against the Ming dynasty.
